note: This data is expressed in 2011 [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation). Following an update, World Bank PIP now uses 2017 international-$ for its poverty and inequality data [available here](https://ourworldindata.org/grapher/poverty-share-on-less-than-30-per-day).
title: Poverty: Share of population living on less than $30 a day
subtitle: This data is adjusted for inflation and for differences in the cost of living between countries.
